txt.en: Talk to Varthmath in the Gladdenmere

'Then I was right when I guessed the stone-giant presence on the far side of the Gladdenmere! It appears the spirits of the dead intruded upon the domain of the stone-giants, and in turn the giants destroyed the bridge in order to keep them away. No wonder the stone-giants that you encountered were so frenzied! I shall return to Grimbeorn at once and relay to him what we learned here. Thank you for your assistance, [placeholder].'
The wilds of the Gladdenmere rest on the northern edge of the River Gladden.\n\nYou should explore the wilds of Gladdenmere for Varthmath.
Varthmath can be found in the Gladdenmere.\n\nYou should talk to Varthmath.
This is the main hold of the stone-giants within the Gladdenmere
On this side of the falls, the stone-giants remain in control of Kidzul-kâlah
The dead roam upon the lone isle in the Gladdenmere

'Look upon the hills across the Gladdenmere. I swear to you: I saw them move! Do you suppose it was the stone-giants who dwell there? Could it be they blocked the path to the Gladdenmere? Perhaps it was an errant rock-toss that cleared the path they once impeded! We should investigate the other side of the Gladdenmere and learn more. I have no quarrels with stone-giants but they are not known to be friendly. The Elves have provided a boat when you are ready to cross the water.'
Varthmath wishes to explore the wilds of the Gladdenmere and learn what lurks in this formerly-inaccessible valley.
